attributes.action: Get rid of female commentators on Match of the Day MOTD
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Football is a lads sport watching a game with a female commentator just dosn't sound right. No disrespect but it shouldn't be the case that are enjoyment of the game is hindered somewhat by a female voice.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
